summary: A story about the family breakup of three divorced men. The film presented their perspective and it reveals their relationship with their children, ex-wives, girl friends, male friendships, and their identities as divorced men.
cast: Matthew Modine|Randy Quaid|Paul Reiser|Janeane Garofalo|Amy Brenneman|Eliza Dushku|Ed Flanders|Maria Pitillo|Lindsay Crouse|Ross Malinger|Johnny Whitworth|Wendell Pierce|Cameron Boyd|Mae Whitman|Jayne Brook|Dana Wheeler-Nicholson|Amber Benson|Rob Reiner|Pamela Dillman|Brad Hall|Danny Masterson|James Arone|Karlie M. title: Bye bye love
